title: Chapter II - Municipal Affairs
content:
Chapter II - Municipal Affairs

State Regulations

Subchapter A - Sales Of Bonds And Notes; Debt Statements (Part 25 to 39)

Subchapter B - Refunding Of Indebtedness (Part 50)

Subchapter C - Cancellation And Destruction Of Obligations (Part 55)

Subchapter D - Exclusion Of Self-liquidating Indebtedness From Limitations (Part 60 to 62)

Subchapter E - Administration Of Funds Paid Into Courts Of Record (Part 70 to 72)

Subchapter F - Duties Of Justices Of The Peace And Police Justices (Part 75)

Subchapter G - Local Tax Bills And Receipts (Part 80)

Subchapter H - Computation Of Special Municipal Aid (Part 81)

Subchapter I - Forms To Be Used For Computation Of Constitutional Tax Limits (Part 82)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
